name: Aerius: Alien swarm shooter
description:
If you are a fan of classic Arcade space shooter games, you’ll love Aerius too.
In this inter-galactic shoot ‘em up, you’ll swarm through the galaxy in your spaceship shooting swarms of asteroids and aliens, defending and protecting Earth from space invaders.

Aerius is an intergalactic spaceship shooter game where you must avoid the obstacles and destroy the attacking aliens using lasers, missiles and other heavy duty overpowered weapons.

Choose between different spaceships, and various planetary systems. As you finish defending each level, the challenge becomes harder and harder as the swarms of asteroids and aliens grow .

STORY
In the year 3760, on the outermost edges of nowhere in deep dark space a meteorite struck planet XY4QT6. The inhabitants of planet XY4QT6 are not a friendly bunch. They are evil and violent creatures who are desperate to do whatever it takes to ensure the survival of their species.

After all of their resources were lost they we’re losing people by the thousands. In order to propagate and for the species to survive, the hostile dictatorial droids set out to impose their brutal system on other planetary systems in order to pillage their resources.

That’s when the peaceful existence in our Solar planetary system was changed forever. The happy utopia our beings had been enjoying for the last several millennia, since the majority of life on Earth was destroyed, would never be the same.

In order for our race and allies to survive, the Intergalactic Air force must unite and fight to save ourselves and other neighboring planetary systems from the hostel invaders.

Do you have what it takes?
